commentBody:
For those concerned about who would replace Coughlin, in my view, the Giants ownership would be one of the more desirable groups to work for in the NFL. Especially given who some of the other owners are around the league. There are a lot of cartoon characters out there. I don't know why a top flight coach and GM wouldn't want to have the opportunity to excel on behalf of this organization.

The Giants need to remember that and hire accordingly without being hasty or selling themselves short.
